title: AdhAramAna paramAtma
sahitya:
AdhAramAna paramAtma jaya nAyakanai ArvamuDan kUvi aNaivOm manamE


anupallavi

  vEdAgama shikhara jyOtiyinai mEdiniyil virivAna uyirengum arivAga viLaiyAdum


caraNam    saNDai madam aNugAdu sAmIpa sAlOka sArUpa sAyujya upashAnta padavi tarum
piNDattil irundapaDi aNDattil irukkinra brahmattait-turiyattaip-pirivariya shiva sattai
